leg.transformationDescription:
A layer of roach-like chitin quickly grows over [npc.her] legs as they shift into a new form. As [npc.her] new chitin spreads down to the ends of [npc.her] toes, it splits around the joints leaving an almost doll or gauntlet-like appearance to them, leaving [npc.him] with plantigrade, roach-like talons. As the transformation ends, [npc.she] [npc.verb(see)] that [npc.her] new chitin plates sharply transition into the [npc.skin] covering the rest of [npc.her] body at [npc.her] upper-thigh.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] plantigrade, [style.boldBrownDark(roach-like legs and talons)], which are [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription].
leg.bodyDescription: [npc.Her] legs are [npc.materialCompositionDescriptor] [npc.legFullDescription(true)], and [npc.her] feet are covered small chitin plates splitting at the joints. [npc.Her] toes are curved to easily grasp narrow perches.
